movies.title: Dödsängeln
movies.plot: Miranda, a stroppy teenager of Iraqi parentage is abducted and dies after rowing with the choir-mistress and Bea,another chorister. Wallander pulls in ex-racist skinhead Johan, the boy Miranda stole from Bea and then dropped, but has to release him. When Lina, another choir member vanishes, the trail leads to Thomas Hammar,a recluse,seemingly obsessed with the choir, but his motives for following them are personal and innocent. The real culprit is much nearer home.
movies.simplePlot: Miranda, a stroppy teenager of Iraqi parentage is abducted and dies after rowing with the choir-mistress and Bea,another chorister. Wallander pulls in ex-racist skinhead Johan, the boy ...

biography.bio: Krister Henriksson was born on November 12, 1946 in Häverö, Stockholms län, Sweden as Jan Krister Allan Henriksson. He is an actor and director, known for Wallander: enquêtes criminelles (2005), Reconstruction (2003) and Infidèle (2000). He has been married to Cecilia Nilsson since 1988. They have one child.
biography.name: Krister Henriksson

biography.bio: Lena Endre was born on July 8, 1955 in Härnösand, Västernorrlands län, Sweden. She is an actress, known for The Girl with the Dragon Tattoo (2009), The Girl Who Played with Fire (2009) and The Girl Who Kicked the Hornet's Nest (2009). She was previously married to Richard Hobert, Thomas Hanzon, Vjeko Benzon and Malte Ekblom.
biography.name: Lena Endre

biography.bio: Sverrir Gudnason was born on September 12, 1978. He is an actor, known for Valse pour Monica (2013), Gentlemen (2014) and Blowfly Park (2014).
biography.name: Sverrir Gudnason

biography.bio: Nina Zanjani was born on September 1, 1981 in Stockholm, Stockholms län, Sweden. She is an actress, known for Mind the Gap (2007), Balls (2010) and Wallander: enquêtes criminelles (2005).
biography.name: Nina Zanjani

biography.bio: Fredrik Gunnarsson was born on September 4, 1965 in Oxelösund, Östergötlands län, Sweden. He is an actor, known for Wallander: enquêtes criminelles (2005), Show Me Love (1998) and Lycka till och ta hand om varandra (2012).
biography.name: Fredrik Gunnarsson

biography.bio: Mats Bergman was born on May 5, 1948 in Gothenburg, Västra Götalands län, Sweden. He is an actor, known for Wallander: enquêtes criminelles (2005), Evil (2003) and Den ofrivillige golfaren (1991).
biography.name: Mats Bergman

biography.bio: Douglas Johansson was born on January 31, 1960. He is an actor, known for The Impossible (2012), Wallander: enquêtes criminelles (2005) and Arn: The Knight Templar (2007).
biography.name: Douglas Johansson

biography.bio: Marianne Mörck was born on September 2, 1949 in Sweden. She is an actress and director, known for Wallander: enquêtes criminelles (2005), Credo (1997) and Hon jazzade en sommar (2003).
biography.name: Marianne Mörck

biography.bio: Noah Valdfogel is an actor, known for Skorna (2009) and Wallander: enquêtes criminelles (2005).
biography.name: Noah Valdfogel

biography.bio: Henny Åman is an actress, known for Wallander: enquêtes criminelles (2005).
biography.name: Henny Åman

biography.bio: Lia Boysen was born on April 6, 1966 in Stockholm, Stockholms län, Sweden as Lia Marika Boysen. She is known for her work on Un pays idéal (2000), Executive Protection (2001) and Les grandes personnes (2008).
biography.name: Lia Boysen

biography.bio: Nour El-Refai was born on November 14, 1987. She is an actress and writer, known for Frostbitten (2006), Something must break (2014) and When Darkness Falls (2006).
biography.name: Nour El-Refai

biography.bio: Sofia Pekkari was born on September 1, 1985. She is an actress, known for Girl with a video camera (2005), Möbelhandlarens dotter (2006) and Den enskilde medborgaren (2006).
biography.name: Sofia Pekkari

biography.bio: Grete Havnesköld's movie career started at the tender age of 5 when she starred in 'Lotta på Bråkmakargatan'. But when she was little, theatre wasn't something she wanted to do. She wanted to work with horses! Now she's 21 years old and graduated from the theatre/stage program, at the Wendela Hebbe High School, in 2005 in her home town Södertälje. She aims to enter Acting School and then work with theatre and film. And cuddle with horses in her spare time.
biography.name: Grete Havnesköld

biography.bio: Mats Blomgren was born on April 12, 1960 in Vänersborg, Västra Götalands län, Sweden as Sven Mats Anders Blomgren. He is an actor, known for Le Lendemain (2015), Together (2000) and Patrik, Age 1.5 (2008).
biography.name: Mats Blomgren
